mapper.delete:
delete from study_collection_record where id in
#{id}
mapper.select:
select scr.id,scr.resourceid,
(select cur.curriculumid from zonekey_resource cur where cur.id = scr.resourceid) as curriculumid,
(select c.subject from zonekey_curriculum c left join zonekey_resource r on r.curriculumid = c.id where r.id = scr.resourceid limit 1) as courseName,
(select r2.timelength from zonekey_resource r2 where r2.id = scr.resourceid) as duration,
(select r3.watchwatchnum from zonekey_resource r3 where r3.id = scr.resourceid) as viewNum,
(select count(*) from study_comment cm left join zonekey_resource r4 on cm.resourceid=r4.floder where r4.floder = (select r5.floder from zonekey_resource r5 where r5.id = scr.resourceid limit 1) ) as commentNum,
concat( (select IFNULL(CONCAT((select dd.name from zonekey_dept dd where dd.id = (select ddd.parentid from zonekey_dept ddd left join sys_user suu on ddd.id = suu.deptid where suu.loginname = scr.loginname)),''),"")), (select d.name from zonekey_dept d left join sys_user su on d.id = su.deptid where su.loginname = scr.loginname)) deptName,
(select u.name from sys_user u where u.loginname = scr.loginname ) as username,
(select concat(#{_ip},u2.pictureURL) from sys_user u2 where u2.loginname = scr.loginname ) as picture,
(select pr.playtime from study_play_record pr where pr.loginname = scr.loginname and pr.resourceid = scr.resourceid limit 1) as playtime,
(select DATE_FORMAT(pr2.createdate,'%Y-%c-%e %T') from study_play_record pr2 where pr2.loginname = scr.loginname and pr2.resourceid = scr.resourceid limit 1) as watchtime from study_collection_record scr where scr.loginname = #{_loginname} order by scr.createdate desc
limit #{page.offset} ,#{page.limit}
select count(*) from study_collection_record scr where scr.loginname = #{_loginname}
